  • Uses of Img in camzup.core

    Methods in camzup.core that return Img 
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    Img Img.clone()
    Creates a new image from this one.
    static Img Img.crop​(int x0, int y0, int x1, int y1, Img source, Img target)
    Given a top left and bottom right corner, sets the target image to the cropped region of the source.
    static Img Img.crop​(Vec2 tl, Vec2 br, Img source, Img target)
    Given a top left and bottom right corner, sets the target image to the cropped region of the source.
    static Img Img.falseColor​(Gradient grd, Img target)
    Recolors an image in-place with a color gradient.
    static Img Img.falseColor​(Gradient grd, Img source, Img target)
    Recolors an image to a target image with a color gradient.
    static Img Img.fill​(Gradient grd, Img target)
    Fills an image with a gradient in place.
    static Img Img.linear​(float xOrigin, float yOrigin, float xDest, float yDest, Gradient grd, Img target)
    Generates a linear gradient from an origin point to a destination point.
    static Img Img.linear​(Vec2 origin, Vec2 dest, Gradient grd, Img target)
    Generates a linear gradient from an origin point to a destination point.
    static Img Img.opaque​(Img source, Img target)
    Remove transparency from the image by compositing all colors with opaque black.
    static Img Img.radial​(float xOrigin, float yOrigin, float radius, Gradient grd, Img target)
    Generates a radial gradient.
    static Img Img.radial​(Vec2 origin, float radius, Gradient grd, Img target)
    Generates a radial gradient.
    Img Img.reallocate​(int w, int h)
    Internal function to reallocate an image's pixel array if the width and height of the image are different.
    static Img Img.rgb​(int w, int h, Img target)
    Generates a diagnostic image where a pixel's location on the x-axis correlates to the color red; on the y-axis, to green.
    static Img Img.rgb​(Img target)
    Generates a diagnostic image where a pixel's location on the x-axis correlates to the color red; on the y-axis, to green.
    static Img Img.wrap​(int dx, int dy, Img source, Img target)
    Blits a source image's pixels onto a target image's pixels, using floor modulo to wrap the source.
    static Img Img.wrap​(Vec2 st, Img source, Img target)
    Blits a source image's pixels onto a target image's pixels, using floor modulo to wrap the source.
